snorri.terrain

Class IslandGen

  • java.lang.Object
    • snorri.terrain.TerrainGen
      • snorri.terrain.IslandGen

  • public class IslandGen
extends TerrainGen
    Create a Bermuda-like island by sloping the edges of the height map down. Increasing SINK_FACTOR will make the island's edges sink more. Shoutout to Uzimon.
    Author:
    lambdaviking
